channel.title: REQ ::potup command
channel.description:
I need a ::potup command for a 508 server, i've tried making one myself but got errors D:
Sorry if this is in the wrong section :)

item.title: REQ ::potup command
item.dc:creator: @isassi isassi
item.description:
@isassi wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:3, topic:362144”]Firstly, well done on trying the command yourself before asking for help.
Secondly, when you have tried yourself and you are getting errors don’t forget to post the code you made! We will be able to help you and point out where you are going wrong.
Thirdly (and lastly), when you post a help topic on a specific command make sure you specify exactly what you want you want the command to do.

Thanks.[/quote]

Okay i shall do and i would like the command to pot up range strength defence and attack like super potions but i can’t do it would show the code but as it was creating errors and i wanted to continue coding i got rid of it

Read full topic

item.title: REQ ::potup command

item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Firstly, well done on trying the command yourself before asking for help.
Secondly, when you have tried yourself and you are getting errors don’t forget to post the code you made! We will be able to help you and point out where you are going wrong.
Thirdly (and lastly), when you post a help topic on a specific command make sure you specify exactly what you want you want the command to do.

Thanks.
